comment.author: 62508825@N00
comment._content: 2 Lt Byron Edward Brenan, Gloucester Regiment. Killed 18th April 1915 - 3rd Battalion Attached to 2nd Battalion. Born 22nd March 1895, in Hong Kong. Son of Edward and Marion, of Bath. Commissioned August 1914, 3rd Battalion. Killed whilst repairing trenches damaged by shell fire, near Ypres. Aged 20. Buried at Ypres Town Cemetery Extension, Ieper. glosters.tripod.com/1915off.html Cemetery grave memorial photo www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=pv&GRid=127367...
